snippet: A consortium of nongovernmental organizations called on the world’s rich countries to pledge to offer sanctuary to at least 180,000 Syrians, just 5 percent of refugees from Syria.
abstract: Consortium of nongovernmental organizations call on governments to pledge to offer refuge to at least 180,000 Syrians, or 5 percent of all Syrian refugees.
lead_paragraph: A consortium of nongovernmental organizations called on the world’s rich countries to pledge to offer sanctuary to at least 180,000 Syrians, just 5 percent of refugees from Syria.

headline.main: Rich Nations Urged to Take In Syrian Refugees
headline.print_headline: Rich Countries Urged to Help Syria Refugees
